title: The Head and the Heart feat. Hrishikesh Hirway & Joshua Malina
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Joshua Malina (The West Wing, Scandal) and Hrishikesh Hirway (Song Exploder, The West Wing Weekly) co-star in this Jewish tale about two brothers who make two very different ways in the world.
